title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 52.17 - Search of entering and departing civilians
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 52.17 - Search of entering and departing civilians

State Regulations

Civilian workmen employed on construction projects within the
institution, and all other persons not employed in the department, who enter or
leave the institution, shall be thoroughly searched. Such search is to include
lunch boxes, lunch packages, tool receptacles, or any other packages or
bundles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
52.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
